dict.acceptation: 最，最多（大）；much的最高级；非常，很；几乎；
many的最高级；最多的，最大的；大概的；大多数的，大部分的；
最大限度；大部分；大多数人；

sent.orig: The ant is the most industrious animal; however, it is the most taciturn one.
sent.trans: 没有任何动物比蚂蚁更勤奋，然而它却最沉默寡言。

sent.orig: The most furious anarchist become the most barefaced apostate.
sent.trans: 最激烈的无政府主义者，居然成了最露骨的变节者。

sent.orig: Under the cash basis of accounting most receipts of money are revenues and most expenditures of money are expenses.
sent.trans: 按现金收付制规定，企业收到的现金大都作为收入处理，付出的现金大都作为费用处理。

sent.orig: "This advice is most valuable," said Sun Quan.
'Why are you drinking whisky at 8 o'clock in the morning?' 'Hair of the dog.I've got the most terrible hangover.'
sent.trans: “你干吗早上8点喝威士忌？”“解宿醉，从来没有酒后这么难受过。”
